name: Wild Galway Escape The Black Hound
name_original: Wild Galway Escape The Black Hound
description:
Controls; WASD to move, space to jump

Collect the flowing flowers to send the black dog away temporarily.

Get the highest score you can!

Hi there!

This is a webGL version of our gamejam game WIld Galway Escape the Black hound, created for Galway Game Jam 19 which was held in july 2022 and which was sponsored by Ardán as part of the wild galway gaming initiative.

This was the first time the lazy poodle men met.
